author: 小浪财讯
title: 思瑞浦跌2.01%，成交额1.77亿元，主力资金净流出125.17万元|思瑞浦_新浪财经_新浪网
text:
7月3日， 思瑞浦 盘中下跌2.01%，截至13:15，报130.50元/股，成交1.77亿元，换手率1.00%，总市值173.04亿元。
资金流向方面，主力资金净流出125.17万元，特大单买入114.24万元，占比0.65%，卖出276.40万元，占比1.56%；大单买入4108.91万元，占比23.23%，卖出4071.92万元，占比23.03%。
思瑞浦今年以来股价涨41.08%，近5个交易日跌7.02%，近20日跌18.16%，近60日涨3.33%。
今年以来思瑞浦已经2次登上龙虎榜，最近一次登上龙虎榜为4月15日。
资料显示，思瑞浦微电子科技(苏州)股份有限公司位于中国(上海)自由贸易试验区张东路1761号2幢第二层、第三层、第四层，成立日期2012年4月23日，上市日期2020年9月21日，公司主营业务涉及模拟集成电路产品研发和销售。主营业务收入构成为：信号链类模拟芯片79.91%，电源类模拟芯片20.04%，其他(补充)0.04%，其他0.01%。
思瑞浦所属申万行业为：电子-半导体-模拟芯片设计。所属概念板块包括：百元股、模拟芯片、汽车芯片、基金重仓、集成电路等。
截至3月31日，思瑞浦股东户数9109.00，较上期减少21.44%；人均流通股14557股，较上期增加27.29%。2025年1月-3月，思瑞浦实现营业收入4.22亿元，同比增长110.88%；归母净利润1556.30万元，同比增长131.65%。
分红方面，思瑞浦A股上市后累计派现9098.51万元。近三年，累计派现2476.03万元。
机构持仓方面，截止2025年3月31日，思瑞浦十大流通股东中，万家优选（161903）位居第五大流通股东，持股500.00万股，持股数量较上期不变。银河创新混合A（519674）位居第六大流通股东，持股366.00万股，为新进股东。万家自主创新混合A（008120）位居第九大流通股东，持股200.00万股，为新进股东。嘉实上证科创板芯片ETF（588200）位居第十大流通股东，持股199.85万股，相比上期减少1595.00股。香港中央结算有限公司退出十大流通股东之列。

author: Jessica Coates
title: Australian woman training to become country's first female astronaut | St George & Sutherland Shire Leader | St George, NSW
text: A mum-of-two is one step closer to being Australia's first female astronaut. [Australian Space Agency](/story/8449301/) employee Katherine Bennell-Pegg announced she was halfway through her year-long training at the European Astronaut Centre in Germany. While other Australian women have trained to go to space, they've always done so under the flags of other countries. Ms Bennell-Beg and her family relocated to Europe for the intensive training process. More than 22,000 people applied to the coveted position in hopes of becoming an astronaut candidate. The job requires rigorous physical training, as well as a year of intensive study. "I have always dreamed of being an astronaut," she said. "When I was young, it was for the adventure but after more than a decade working in space it's now because I know the role it plays in tackling real-world problems." The next six months are expected to include intense exercise, sea survival, studying space station robotic arm simulations and centrifuge training. "We need to know the basics around medical procedures - not just in case something goes wrong, but because astronauts are basically medical guinea pigs," she told the [ Australian Space Agency](/story/8338233/). "In space, as your body adapts to weightlessness any medical issues you may have on Earth - such as osteoporosis, or muscle degradation - are put on fast forward and we can support research on that." The Adelaide-born astronaut candidate previously served as Director of Space Technology at the Australian Space Agency, and as part of the space robotics and automation team. In early December, Ms Bennell-Pegg travelled to the United States where she underwent specialised training with NASA in Houston and met with Australian Ambassador to the United States Kevin Rudd in Washington DC. "I'm excited - not just for me - but for what my training and experience can unlock for Australian scientists, engineers and operators, and all the value that can bring," she said. Sign up for our newsletter to stay up to date. We care about the protection of your data. Read our [Privacy Policy](/privacy/).

author: Правда.Ру
title: Сильная спина и уверенная осанка - начните с этого упражнения
text: Фитнес-тренер Джо Холдер поделился эффективным способом развить силу спины и плечевого пояса. В интервью изданию Men Today он отметил, что отличным выбором станет тяга штанги в наклоне — базовое, но мощное упражнение. По словам эксперта, этот элемент тренировки способствует набору мышечной массы, улучшению плотности костей, а также может снизить болевые ощущения в пояснице за счёт укрепления опорных мышц.

author: @KyleIrv_
title: Elijah Moore injury update: Browns WR leaves game vs. Jets after suffering frightening concussion | Sporting News United Kingdom
text: The Browns were already shorthanded at wide receiver for their "Thursday Night Football" matchup against the Jets [with Amari Cooper out due to a heel injury](https://www.sportingnews.com/us/nfl/news/amari-cooper-heel-injury-update-browns/2d97ab4d995be7a75525d01c). Their depth chart got even shorter when Elijah Moore suffered a scary head injury in the second quarter. Joe Flacco had found Moore open across the middle for a 22-yard gain, but he hit his head hard on the ground once he got tackled, knocking him out of the contest. MORE: [Follow live: Browns take on Jets as Cleveland looks to clinch playoff berth on 'TNF'](https://www.sportingnews.com/us/nfl/news/jets-browns-live-score-highlights-thursday-night-football/363b8bf15ba889110fff9906) How serious is Moore's injury? The Sporting News has you covered with the latest updates below. Elijah Moore head injury update Moore was stepping up in Cooper's absence early on in the Browns' "Thursday Night Football" showdown against the Jets. Moore was having a productive game against his former team, tallying five receptions for 61 yards and a touchdown. When Flacco found him on a crossing route in the second quarter, Moore added 22 yards to his total before a regular tackle by Jets linebacker CJ Mosley caused him to hit his head hard on the ground. Moore's immediate reaction was a frightening one as the Browns' medical staff rushed to the field. ( [You can watch the play here](https://x.com/NFL_DovKleiman/status/1740562037330341938?s=20), with viewer discretion advised.) Moore, thankfully, was able to get to his feet and walk into the blue medical tent. Moments after he walked to the locker room under his own power. He has been ruled out for the remainder of the game with a concussion. Check back for updates as they become available.

author: Marcos Rodríguez López
title: Ecológico, económico y efectivo: El truco del laurel para alejar a las hormigas de tu cocina
text:
Las hormigas son visitantes frecuentes en nuestras cocinas durante el verano, atraídas por la búsqueda de comida y agua. Si bien no son peligrosas en sí mismas, pueden convertirse en una molestia considerable. Afortunadamente, existen métodos ecológicos, económicos y efectivos para mantenerlas alejadas, y uno de ellos es el truco del laurel y el vinagre.
El laurel, también conocido como 'Laurus nobilis', es una planta aromática con propiedades repelentes naturales contra insectos como las hormigas. Contiene un compuesto llamado cineol, un aceite esencial con un aroma fuerte que resulta desagradable para estos insectos.
Por su parte, el vinagre posee un ácido acético que también actúa como repelente de hormigas. Además, tiene propiedades desinfectantes que ayudan a eliminar las feromonas que dejan estos insectos para marcar su camino.
Con esto, la combinación de laurel y vinagre crea una barrera invisible que las hormigas evitan cruzar. Para preparar este repelente natural, solo necesitas:
- Dos hojas de laurel.
- 400 ml de agua.
- Una pequeña cantidad de clavos (planta)
- 100 ml de vinagre de limpieza.
¿Cómo usar este truco?
- En una olla pequeña, pon a hervir el agua con el laurel y los clavos durante unos 5 minutos.
- Una vez haya enfriado, colocar eso en un pulverizador junto al vinagre (ayúdate de un colador).
- Rocía la solución en las zonas donde hayas visto hormigas, como entradas, rincones, encimeras y alrededor de los basureros, o también échala en tu bayeta y limpia con ella.
- Repite la aplicación cada dos o tres días para mantener el efecto repelente.
Algunos consejos adicionales
- Para un efecto más duradero, puedes macerar las hojas de laurel en el vinagre durante una semana antes de usarlo.
- También puedes colocar bolsitas de tela con hojas de laurel secas en los lugares estratégicos de tu cocina.
- Mantén tu cocina limpia y libre de migas y restos de comida para evitar atraer a las hormigas.
- Si el problema persiste, puedes considerar utilizar métodos más drásticos, como cebos comerciales o el control profesional de plagas.
Recuerda que este es un método natural y seguro para alejar a las hormigas de tu cocina. Es una alternativa ecológica y económica a los pesticidas químicos, y además aporta las propiedades beneficiosas del laurel y el vinagre.
Con un poco de constancia y la aplicación regular de este truco, podrás disfrutar de una cocina libre de hormigas este verano y durante todo el año.

author: Julia Schneemann
title: Araphoe Basin Ski Area, CO, Receives 2 Feet of Snow
text:
It’s dumping at
Arapahoe Basin Ski Area, Colorado, with the resort seeing about a foot of the white fluffy stuff in the last 48 hours and more in the forecast. The past week has been just what the doctor ordered providing the Colorado ski resort with over two feet of snow and allowing it to open The Beavers and Pali terrain.
A-Basin’s patrol team is working diligently to open more of the mountain as soon as possible, please keep an eye on the resort’s
terrain status for real-time updates. As of Sunday, January 14, the resort has a base of 42 inches with 11 inches alone falling in the last 48 hours. Currently 32 out of 144 runs are open and six of the resort’s nine lifts are spinning.
On top of great snow, Arapahoe Basin Ski Area has plenty coming up on its events calendar, including the last two Rise n’ Shine Rando Races on
January 23, the famous Moonlight Dinners, and the NSAA Safety Village on January 27, just to mention a few events.
Remember, A-Basin limits ticket sales every single day of the season to preserve the experience, so make sure to book online in advance to avoid disappointment. The resort has been limiting daily numbers to mitigate crowds, put less stress on the terrain, reduce parking issues, shorten lift lines, and keep A-Basin a beautiful, laid-back ski area with room on the slopes and a seat at the bar.

author: Ed Valentine
title: Injuries? What injuries? Giants have full participation in Thursday’s practice
text: Every player on the [New York Giants](https://www.bigblueview.com/)’ 53-man roster participated in Thursday’s practice, good news for the Giants as they prepare for a Week 17 game against the Loa Angeles Rams. There has been concern about punter Jamie Gillan. He entered last week’s game with a sore left groin, and then injured his left (kicking) knee chasing Eagles’ punt returner Britain Covey on a 54-yard return. Gillan has punted 85 times this season, a career high. Only Thomas Morstead (87) of the [New York Jets](https://www.ganggreennation.com/) has punted more. Special teams coordinator Thomas McGaughey said Gillan has “got a lot of reps in that leg” and is “getting a little tender” toward the end of the season. Giants-Rams injury report Giants Limited participation CB Deonte Banks (shoulder) TE Lawrence Cager (groin) P Jamie Gillan (left groin/left knee) DL Dexter Lawrence (hamstring) OL Justin Pugh (elbow/back) DL A’Shawn Robinson (back) DL Rakeem Nunez-Roches (knee) Full participation RB Saquon Barkley (elbow) G Ben Bredeson (quad) CB Adoree’ Jackson (ankle) WR Wan’Dale Robinson (quad) C John Michael Schmitz (shoulder) TE Darren Waller (knee)

author: Lynda Hanna
title: Titre de séjour en France : voici le niveau de langue qui sera exigé à partir de 2025
text:
Comme si l’accès à un titre de séjour et à la nationalité française en France n’étaient pas déjà assez difficiles, le gouvernement français compte serrer encore plus la vis à partir de l’année prochaine.
Cette fois-ci, il s’agit du conditionnement de la délivrance des titres et de cartes de séjour à la réussite d’un test de langue française. Il s’agit là d’une nouveauté prévue par la loi Darmanin pour l’année 2026, mais que le secrétaire d’État chargé de la citoyenneté, Othman Nasrou compte mettre œuvre dès le mois de juillet 2025.
Loi Darmanin : les niveaux de langue exigés revus à la hausse
Aujourd’hui, pour décrocher une première carte de séjour en France, le demandeur doit justifier d’une « maîtrise du français supérieure ou égale au niveau A2 », lit-on sur le site Service-Public. Les candidats à la nationalité française doivent justifier au moins d’un niveau B1.
Ceci dit, avec la mise en œuvre de la Loi Darmanin, notamment le volet relatif à l’intégration qui porte sur le conditionnement de la délivrance des titres de séjour à la maîtrise de la langue française, la barre sera placée plus haut pour les demandeurs. « Nous allons être plus exigeants en matière d’intégration », a en effet déclaré Othman Nasrou.
Avec l’application de la Loi Darmanin, les exigences seront revues à la hausse. Les demandeurs d’un titre de séjour devront justifier d’un niveau A2. Les demandeurs d’une carte de résident devront quant à eux prouver qu’ils ont au moins atteint le niveau B1 de la langue de Molière. Enfin, les candidats à la nationalité française doivent justifier d’une maîtrise du français égal ou supérieur au niveau B2.
Anciens et nouveaux niveaux de langue exigés : « La différence est énorme »
Dans un reportage diffusé ce 24 octobre 2024, le média français Europe 1 décrit « l’ambiance studieuse » et les inquiétudes des candidats qui règnent dans un centre d’examen de langue française.
Le média zoome sur Esther, une ressortissante malienne qui passe un examen en vue d’atteindre le niveau B1, sans doute pour pouvoir décrocher la nationalité française.
Hélas, c’est la troisième fois qu’elle l’échoue, et ce n’est pas les complications prévues par la loi Darmanin qui risquent de lui faciliter la tâche à partir de juillet 2025. En effet, si les mesures prévues par la nouvelle loi Immigration sont appliquées avant qu’elle ne réussisse son examen, Esther doit atteindre le niveau B2.
Bien que l’écart entre les deux niveaux semble minime, il n’en est rien en vérité. Said, le responsable du centre, explique que la différence entre le niveau B1 et le niveau B2 est « énorme ».
« Ça va être difficile, ça va demander plus de travail », estime quant à elle Esther. En effet, pour passer du niveau A1 au niveau B2 en français, il faudra au minimum 650 heures de formation, estime le média français.

author: Danielle Cassita
title: Hubble detecta "vulcão estelar" que expele jatos no espaço
text:
Hubble detecta "vulcão estelar" que expele jatos no espaço
Por Danielle Cassita • Editado por Luciana Zaramela |
O telescópio Hubble capturou imagens espetaculares de uma estrela nada tranquila. Estamos falando de R Aquarii, um sistema estelar binário encontrado a cerca de 700 anos-luz da Terra. Ali, ocorrem erupções violentas que disparam grandes filamentos gasosos pelo espaço.
Clique e siga o Canaltech no WhatsApp-
Qual é a estrela mais brilhante do céu noturno? Sonificação: NASA divulga mais sons criados a partir de imagens do espaço
Foi em 1990 que o Hubble voltou seus “olhos” para R Aquarii pela primeira vez, revelando que ali havia duas estrelas separadas por bilhões de quilômetros. Agora, os membros da Agência Espacial Europeia e da NASA, que operam juntas o telescópio espacial, produziram um vídeo em timelapse que mostra o comportamento da estrela.
O vídeo foi produzido a partir de observações conduzidas de 2014 a 2023. Ao longo das cinco imagens, é possível ver as mudanças rápidas e dramáticas da estrela binária, bem como da nebulosa ao redor dela. O material disparado ali se estende por uma distância equivalente a 24 vezes o diâmetro do Sistema Solar.
R Aquarii é uma estrela simbiótica, uma classe de estrelas binárias. A estrela binária ali é uma gigante vermelha 400 vezes maior que o Sol, que pulsa, muda de temperatura e brilho em períodos de 390 dias. Quando está em sua luminosidade máxima, a estrela brilha 5 mil vezes mais forte que nosso astro.
Sua vizinha é uma anã branca, um núcleo estelar denso e quente. Quando ela se aproxima demais da gigante vermelha, sua gravidade captura hidrogênio gasoso que se acumula em sua superfície. O acúmulo leva à fusão nuclear espontânea, fazendo com que a superfície da estrela exploda como uma grande bomba de hidrogênio. Depois da explosão, o ciclo começa outra vez.
Neste processo, o núcleo da estrela dispara longos filamentos que formam arcos e outras estruturas conforme o plasma escapa rápido o suficiente para você viajar da Terra à Lua em 15 minutos. Este plasma é distorcido pela força da explosão e direcionado para cima e para os lados com os campos magnéticos; em seguida, o fluxo de matéria parece colapsar sobre si próprio em padrão espiral.
Fonte: https://science.nasa.gov/missions/hubble/nasas-hubble-sees-a-stellar-volcano/

author: Joey Horta
title: Ski gear and windshield wipers moving with latest storm
text:
Ski gear and windshield wipers moving with latest storm Windshield wipers are flying off shelves, but this latest round of wet weather is great news for skiers headed up to Tahoe.
SAN FRANCISCO - Rain returned to the Bay Area Wednesday, making for slick streets.
Windshield wipers are flying off shelves, but this latest round of wet weather is great news for skiers headed up to Tahoe .
Heavenly Ski Resort posted on social media that they have crews making their own snow and there is natural snow in the forecast .
Drivers are finding it easier to get there and back this year, which was not the case last winter.
"Weather was nice, a little bit of snow overnight but nothing that caused any real traffic," Alan Seefeldt told KTVU after returning from Tahoe to Berkeley.
Ski shops like Sports Basement in Berkeley are getting snowboarders ready to hit the slopes.
"I’m super stoked," Paris Wickliff said while having his board worked on. "It’s one of those things that gets more and more addicting as you get better, I guess, the adrenaline rush."
Ski gear rentals are a hot commodity right now.
The team at Sports Basement smooths out skis on a grinder and applies hot wax to snowboards.
"Couple of my friends go up there, couple times a year, and they said you better have your board waxed cause I don’t want you to be a slow one," snowboarder Kieron Slaughter said. "So, I don’t want to hold up the crew."
Nick Byrne rented skis for the family.
Featured
article Rain rolls through the Bay Area Wet and windy weather returned to the Bay Area on Tuesday afternoon, with conditions expected to last through the evening.
"Hoping to get up for the first time this season and hopefully hit some fresh powder and, if not, at least get our skis broken in," Byrne said.
His nephew is hoping to avoid another wipe out .
"It’s kind of hard, yeah, embarrassing, its cold," Hayden Gonzborger said with a laugh.
In San Rafael, O’Reilly Auto Parts is selling about 40 sets of windshield wipers a day.
"Pretty busy this season," O’Reilly Auto Parts employee Luis Morell said. "Last couple weeks, it was a lot of sales of wipers."
The rain and wind combination has PG&E crews on standby, ready to respond to power outages from fallen trees, according to spokesperson Megan McFarland.
There’s a High Surf Advisory going into effect at 4:00 a.m. Wednesday, with large waves expected along the coast.
